trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbInfoMessageEventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbInfoMessageEventArgs" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.InfoMessage" /> event of an <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection" />.
trans-unit.target: 代表將處理 <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection" /> 的 <see cref="E:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.InfoMessage" /> 事件之方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create an <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbInfoMessageEventArgs> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbInfoMessageEventArgs> 委派 (Delegate) 時，就可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
